Attributes.description: An original piece of scholarship that builds on knowledge and skills acquired from coursework and in consultation with faculty mentors. This self-directed course can be taken in year 1, 2, or 3 of the Program.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: (Exemption from or completion of MIDW 115.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Fri, Start Time: 11:00, End Time: 12:00
